name: Ganpati Mantra
description: Best Ganpati Mantra app with the following feature: Repeat Mantra for 11,21,51 or 108 times. Set the mantra as Alarm. Set the mantra as Ringtone. No requirement of internet during use of app. Smooth transitions & full of animations. Hindi & English Lyrics with the meaning. Text in sync with the audio. Can use Bell , Shankh & Garlend (Foolon ki mala). Beautiful collection of lord ganpati Images , which changes itself during use of app. Option to select image change interval. Continuos update on the present count/Repetition of Mantra. Notify user when run in background. No push ads, spam in app.
